article: simpson focused wednesday on a series of faint parallel lines _ on the walkway outside nicole brown simpson 's house , on an envelope , a piece of paper found nearby and on ronald goldman 's bloody blue jeans _ in their effort to prove the existence of a second killer .
abstract: simpson defense tries to show existence of second killer
